name: Typeasy
tagline: Typesay is web software you can use to create a blog which is simple and clean.
body:
# 使用方法：

1、部署document文件夹下的应用

2、导入document文件夹下的typeasy.sql数据库

3、修改DBConfig.properties中的数据库连接

4、开始使用

后台帐号：admin	密码：123456
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
